name: The Left Hook
description: Try your homemade Krangostura bitters in this cocktail developed by Tona Palomino and Jafrul Shahin of wd-50 in New York.

recipeInstructions.text: Add Batavia Arrack, pineapple juice, simple syrup, and bitters to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled rocks glass (no ice). Top off with sparkling wine.
